title: Reminiscences of childhood at Inverkeithing;
author: Simson, James
snippet: As may be easily imagined, there were many stories of the appearance of " Auld Pow's " ghost.

title: Reminiscences of childhood at Inverkeithing;
author: Simson, James
snippet: He generally  went under the name of " Auld Pow," owing to his bald head.
